# Managed Web Services Tender Announcement

## Tender Details
### Reference Number: cb-6041-76538552
### Amendment Number: 1
### Solicitation Number: 2023-3865
### Publication Date: 2023-05-31
### Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-04T14:00:00
### Amendment Date: 2023-07-04
### Expected Contract Start Date: N/A
### Expected Contract End Date: N/A
### Tender Status: Expired

## Overview
The Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation (CDIC) invites proposals from qualified vendors to provide fully managed web hosting services, including the design and delivery of a scalable and reliable cloud-based hosting environment and content delivery network.

## Contract Requirements
CDIC is seeking a contract for a comprehensive web hosting service that meets the following requirements:

* Design and delivery of a cloud-based hosting environment
* Content delivery network
* Scalability and reliability

## Tender Information
### Tender Category: Service
### Tender Method: Competitive, Open Bidding
### Selection Criteria: Variations or combinations of the above methods

## Commercial Information
### Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
### Regions of Opportunity: Canada
### Regions of Delivery: Worldwide

## Contact Information
### Contact Name: Judy Ann Hollander
### Contact Email: Procurement@cdic.ca
### Contact Phone: (343) 576-2218
### Contact Address:
50 O'Connor, 17th Floor
Ottawa, Ontario K1P 6L2
Canada
